Mono-Katana.name: Mono-Katana
Mono-Katana.description: Two Handed Exotic Very Heavy Melee Weapon. When wielded by the correct user the weapon ignores armor less than 7 SP, full details on page 92.

Rhinocefist.name: Rhinocefist
Rhinocefist.description: Armored large stone chisel glove, covering from hand to shoulder. Requires interface plugs. Can be used both for demolition and brawling, detail of which can be found on page 95.

OUTLet Explosive.name: OUTLet Explosive
OUTLet Explosive.description: Explosive look-alike of an electrical plug adapter. Full rules can be found on page 89.

Utility Tomahawk.name: Utility Tomahawk
Utility Tomahawk.description:
Blade and pike, this steel and composite ice axe can help you climb ice walls while also doing serious damage in a fight.

Can be used as both a melee and ranged weapon, rules for which can be found on page 101.

Mono-Wakizashi.name: Mono-Wakizashi
Mono-Wakizashi.description: One Handed Exotic Heavy Melee Weapon. When wielded by the correct user the weapon ignores armor less than 7 SP, full details on page 93.

KillChip 100 Micro-Bomb.name: KillChip 100 Micro-Bomb
KillChip 100 Micro-Bomb.description: Memory chip, but explosive when plugged into Neuralware. Full rules can be found on page 88.

Superchrome® Glam Rifle.name: Superchrome® Glam Rifle
Superchrome® Glam Rifle.description: The Superchrome® Glam Rifle is an Exotic Assault Rifle. It gives the user a +2 bonus to Wardrobe and Style when equipped. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 120.

Tommyknocker.name: Tommyknocker
Tommyknocker.description: The Tommyknocker is a combo Exotic Very Heavy Pistol and Poor Quality Shotgun. Requires BODY 10 or to be held in two hands when firing, otherwise the user drops the weapon to the ground. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 123.

Magna Knuckles.name: Magna Knuckles
Magna Knuckles.description: One Handed Exotic Medium Melee Weapon. Battery powered EMP effect which can deactivate cyberware, full details can be found on page 96.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
Survivalist.description:
The Eagletech Survivalist is a 2-in-1 Crossbow and Assault RIfle. It is incapable of Autofire. It comes with an integrated Sniping Scope*. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 103.

*Must be manually applied after purchase

Tasmanskiy Klô.name: Tasmanskiy Klô
Tasmanskiy Klô.description:
Big retractable blades in a Combat Glove. 

Excellent Quality Exotic Very Heavy Melee Weapon.

Full details can be found on page 99.

E-TACK Public Defender.name: E-TACK Public Defender
E-TACK Public Defender.description:
Comes with a Smartgun Link attachment*. The User needs a Subdermal Grip to operate it. It has a Lethal and Non-lethal mode.

Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 115.

* This Upgrade needs to be added manually.

Westwood.name: Westwood
Westwood.description: The Westwood is a Very Heavy Pistol. 6 shot capacity that can't be upgraded with magazine attachments. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 121.

Overlord Handcannon.name: Overlord Handcannon
Overlord Handcannon.description: The Overlord Handcannon is a Poor Quality Exotic Heavy Pistol with a ROF of 1. It may give a +1 bonus to Facedowns in certain situations. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 106.

Hades Multipurpose Assault Shotgun.name: Hades Multipurpose Assault Shotgun
Hades Multipurpose Assault Shotgun.description: The Hades Multipurpose Assault Shotgun is an Exotic Shotgun. The magazine holds 16 shots. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 109.

BMG-500.name: BMG-500
BMG-500.description: The Techtronika Russia BMG-500 is an Exotic Assault Rifle with a magazine of 500 rounds and a bipod. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 122.

Weeping Reaver Katana.name: Weeping Reaver Katana
Weeping Reaver Katana.description:
Excellent Quality Two Handed Exotic Very Heavy Melee Weapon. Contains three doses of specific fluids for blade coating:

  • Arasaka Fire (can ignite target)
  • Arasaka Acid (ablates armor)
  • Arasaka Wound Salt (applies a second critical injury)

Full rules can be found on page 91.

Bubba Buster.name: Bubba Buster
Bubba Buster.description: The GunMart Bubba Buster is a Poor Quality Exotic Shotgun. It destroys itself if fired more than 3 times in a minute. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 106.

Mono-Guard.name: Mono-Guard
Mono-Guard.description:
Monowire, One Handed Exotic Heavy Melee Weapon.

Can apply multiple Critical Injuries, details of which can be found on page 96.

Fox Dual Ammo Pistol.name: Fox Dual Ammo Pistol
Fox Dual Ammo Pistol.description: The Militech Fox Dual Ammo Pistol is an Exotic Heavy Pistol. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 113.

M-04 Variable Assault.name: M-04 Variable Assault
M-04 Variable Assault.description: The Sternmeyer M-04 Variable Assault is a Poor Quality Exotic Assault Rifle with a custom Grenade Launcher underbarrel. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 119.

Nomad Rocker.name: Nomad Rocker
Nomad Rocker.description: The Nomad Rocker is a Poor Quality Exotic Very Heavy Pistol that fires rocks. Ammo is free for this weapon. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 115.

White Hornet Tanto.name: White Hornet Tanto
White Hornet Tanto.description: One Handed Exotic Medium Melee Weapon. Can render target unconscious rather than dead, with full rules found on page 93.

TechHammer.name: TechHammer
TechHammer.description: The KTech TechHammer is an Exotic Shotgun/Rocket Launcher. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 110.

Rostović Kleaver.name: Rostović Kleaver
Rostović Kleaver.description:
Two Handed Exotic Very Heavy Melee Weapon. Can use a battery pack to increase damage, details of which can be found on page 94.

Need BODY 11 or more to use it.

Superchrome® Javelin.name: Superchrome® Javelin
Superchrome® Javelin.description: The Superchrome® Javelin is an Exotic Sniper Rifle. Gives the user a +2 bonus to Wardrobe and Style when equipped. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 120.

ModFire 10X (Pistol).name: ModFire 10X (Pistol)
ModFire 10X (Pistol).description: The ModFire 10X is an Exotic Heavy Pistol. Can also be transformed into an Exotic SMG or an Exotic Assault Rifle, assuming the user has all the needed parts. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 114.

GunMart Smart Special.name: GunMart Smart Special
GunMart Smart Special.description: The GunMart Smart Special is a Poor Quality Exotic Heavy Pistol with an integrated Smartgun Link. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 108.

Mono-Star.name: Mono-Star
Mono-Star.description:
Mono-Shuriken whose orb center contains a kinetic and solar motor allowing the star to spin on itself and vibrate.

Can be used as both a melee and ranged weapon, rules for which can be found on page 101.

Engage Rocket Launcher.name: Engage Rocket Launcher
Engage Rocket Launcher.description: The GunMart Engage Rocket Launcher is a Poor Quality Exotic Rocket Launcher. It explodes on a Critical Failure or when unloading the weapon. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 107.

Pursuit Security Bouncer.name: Pursuit Security Bouncer
Pursuit Security Bouncer.description:
Battery powered glove.

One Handed Exotic Combination Stun Baton and Microwaver.

Full details can be found on page 97.

Faisal's Dead or Alive.name: Faisal's Dead or Alive
Faisal's Dead or Alive.description: The Faisal's Dead Or Alive is a Poor Quality Exotic Shotgun with an integrated Poor Quality Net Launcher. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 104.

Crowd Buster.name: Crowd Buster
Crowd Buster.description:
The Pursuit Security Inc. Crowd Buster is an Exotic Assault Rifle with a unique alternate firing mode. It comes with a pair of Auto Level Dampening Ear Protectors*. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 116.

*Must be manually applied after purchase

GunMart Special.name: GunMart Special
GunMart Special.description: The GunMart Special is a Poor Quality Exotic Heavy Pistol. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 108.

ModFire 10X (SMG).name: ModFire 10X (SMG)
ModFire 10X (SMG).description: The ModFire 10X is an Exotic Heavy Pistol. Can also be transformed into an Exotic SMG or an Exotic Assault Rifle, assuming the user has all the needed parts. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 114.

Superchrome® Sidearm.name: Superchrome® Sidearm
Superchrome® Sidearm.description: The Superchrome® Sidearm is an Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Gives the user a +2 bonus to Wardrobe and Style when equipped. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 121.

Arasaka Prototype Variable Assault Rifle.name: Arasaka Prototype Variable Assault Rifle
Arasaka Prototype Variable Assault Rifle.description: The Arasaka Prototype Variable Assault Rifle is an Excellent Quality Exotic Assault Rifle. Assuming you have all the parts, it can use an alternate unique railgun mode. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 102.

ModFire 10X (Rifle).name: ModFire 10X (Rifle)
ModFire 10X (Rifle).description: The ModFire 10X is an Exotic Heavy Pistol. Can also be transformed into an Exotic SMG or an Exotic Assault Rifle, assuming the user has all the needed parts. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 114.

TR-4 Detonator Fluid.name: TR-4 Detonator Fluid
TR-4 Detonator Fluid.description: Must be poured into a fuel tank vehicle to explode. Full rules can be found on page 90.

Beast Shotgun.name: Beast Shotgun
Beast Shotgun.description: The Midnight Arms Beast Shotgun is an Exotic Shotgun. Its magazine holds 40 rounds. Requires BODY 10 or higher (unless mounted) when fired or the User will suffer the consequences. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 111.

Perseus.name: Perseus
Perseus.description: The Militech Perseus is an Excellent Quality Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Full Rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 112.

Ulični Uništitelj (Street Destroyer).name: Ulični Uništitelj (Street Destroyer)
Ulični Uništitelj (Street Destroyer).description: The Rostović Ulični Uništitelj (Street Destroyer) is a Poor Quality Exotic Shotgun. The magazine only holds 3 shots. It can only shoot Shotgun Shells. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 117.

Ranger Combat Boomerang.name: Ranger Combat Boomerang
Ranger Combat Boomerang.description:
Acts like a one Handed Exotic Heavy Melee, though halves SP despite being thrown.

Contains a built in guidance system, details of which can be found on page 100.

Mono-Katana Solo Wolf and Bot.name: Mono-Katana Solo Wolf and Bot
Mono-Katana Solo Wolf and Bot.description:
Poor Quality Two Handed Exotic Very Heavy Melee Weapon.

Mono-Katana cheap look-alike. Rules for spotting them apart can be found on page 92.

Hello Cutie Ultra-K8 Assault Pistol.name: Hello Cutie Ultra-K8 Assault Pistol
Hello Cutie Ultra-K8 Assault Pistol.description: The Sanroo Hello Cutie Ultra-K8 Assault Pistol is an Excellent Quality Exotic Very Heavy Pistol with an Excellent Quality Heavy SMG mode. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 118.

Micro Hydrogen Combustor.name: Micro Hydrogen Combustor
Micro Hydrogen Combustor.description:
A small explosive that detonates after being immersed in a liquid. Is both armor piercing and creates a large cloud of smoke.

Full rules can be found on page 88.

FangFist.name: FangFist
FangFist.description:
Excellent Quality One Handed Exotic Medium Melee Weapon.

A glove with a short retractable blade.

Full details can be found on page 98.

Door Cracker.name: Door Cracker
Door Cracker.description: Cheap explosive item, small area of effect. Full rules can be found on page 87.

Pepper Shaker.name: Pepper Shaker
Pepper Shaker.description: The Federated Arms Pepper Shaker is an Exotic SMG incapable of single shot or aimed shots. Autofire only use 6 bullets for this weapon. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 105.

Mastiff SMG.name: Mastiff SMG
Mastiff SMG.description: The Militech Mastiff SMG is an Exotic Two-Handed SMG and Shotgun. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 113.

Matchmaker.name: Matchmaker
Matchmaker.description: The Georgia Arms Matchmaker is a Poor Quality Exotic Shotgun that only holds one shot in the magazine. Full rules can be found in Black Chrome on Page 105.
